author: VICE Staff, Josh Visser
title: VICE’s Somewhat Definitive Coronavirus Self-Isolation Recommendation List
description: You’re doing your part by staying home and preventing further spread of COVID-19. Here are 40 ideas how to pass the time.
content:
This article originally appeared on VICE Canada.
Its a horrendous time.
You may be worried about your parents health, your job, and depending on where you live, your entire countrys social safety net. But you are a good person, and like a citizen in Starshi… [+26419 chars]
